title: Healing the Wounds
goal: Deal with the immediate fallout of Valerius's defeat, beginning the process of healing the city and addressing the humanitarian crisis.
stakes_shift: The heroes must now address the humanitarian and political consequences of their actions, working to heal a traumatized city and restore order.

bridge.from_prev: Valerius is defeated, but the city is in chaos and the blight lingers.
bridge.to_next: The heroes realize Valerius was merely a pawn, and a far greater, unknown danger looms.

sections.title: A City in Recovery
sections.intent: Show the immediate efforts to restore order and aid the blighted citizens.

scenes.summary: The group emerges from the tunnels to a city in disarray, leading efforts to calm the populace and tend to those affected by the blight.
scenes.outcome: The city begins a slow process of recovery, with the group aiding in humanitarian efforts.

sections.title: Seeds of Hope
sections.intent: Eldrin uses his magic to begin cleansing the city, offering a symbol of hope.

scenes.summary: Eldrin channels his magic to slowly cleanse areas of the city, offering a tangible sign of hope and healing to the traumatized citizens.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin begins to cleanse parts of the city, offering a symbol of hope and healing.

sections.title: New Leadership
sections.intent: Establish a new, temporary leadership for the city, with Kael playing a role.

scenes.summary: Kael, with his military background, helps establish a provisional council, ensuring stability and preventing further chaos.
scenes.outcome: Kael helps establish a new, temporary leadership to stabilize the city.
